title: Implement Retrieval Tool and Facts Pack Injection in Lane B
description: Implement the tool call in Lane B ReasoningEngine to retrieve facts packs from the retrieval service and inject them into the instruction set for responses about NextGen AI. Ensure citations are included for audit.
acceptance_criteria: Lane B can call the retrieval service with transcript queries
Facts pack is injected into Lane B's instruction set
Structured citations are included in Lane B's internal audit events
Responses about NextGen AI use retrieved facts consistently
